com.tinfoil.sms.sms

Class ConversationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.tinfoil.sms.sms.ConversationView

  • public class ConversationView
extends Activity
    This activity shows all of the conversations the user has with contacts. The list Will be updated every time a message is received. Upon clicking any of the conversations MessageView activity will be started with selectedNumber = the contacts number From the menu a user can select 'compose' to start SendMessageActivity to start or continue a conversation with a contact. The user can also select 'settings' which will take them to the main settings page.
